ref: 14401 kuśa -- 2. 2. *kuśśa -- : Sh. (Lor.) kuš, kušo prob. for kh˚ with Bailey ShGr. 3. *khuśśa -- (→ Bur. khošo ʻ crippled in hands or feet ʼ); Gaw. khušá ʻ lame in arm ʼ, Kal. khūši, Kho. khuši; -- with ṣ: Ash. kuṣö, Kt. kṣö, Pr. kšču, Dm. khuṣa, Phal. khuṣo; -- ʻ left hand ~ crippled ʼ (cf. kharvá -- ): Pr. kṣu lust ʻ left hand ʼ, Dm. khuši das, kuṣāti; Phal. khuši hāt ʻ left hand ʼ, khušēti ʻ left direction, south ʼ.
